mapper.sql: ID, PRODUCT_ID, BIDDING_ID, RESULTS_NUMBER, MY_OFFER_MONEY, DEAL_MONEY, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, SUPPLIER_ID, PROJECT_ID,LIMIT_PRICE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}

select i.MY_OFFER_MONEY,i.PRODUCT_ID,SUPPLIER_ID from T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO i where i.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.BIDDING_ID=#{biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.SUPPLIER_ID=(select SUPPLIER_ID from (select SUPPLIER_ID from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT s where s.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.RANKING=1 ORDER BY CREATED_AT) where rownum=1)

select * from(select SUPPLIER_ID,sum(DEAL_MONEY) as DEAL_MONEY,CREATED_AT from T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO where PROJECT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BIDDING_ID=#{biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY SUPPLIER_ID,CREATED_AT)s ORDER BY s.DEAL_MONEY ASC,s.CREATED_AT ASC
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
insert into T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO (ID, PRODUCT_ID, BIDDING_ID, RESULTS_NUMBER, MY_OFFER_MONEY, DEAL_MONEY, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, SUPPLIER_ID, PROJECT_ID,LIMIT_PRICE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{myOfferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO
ID,
PRODUCT_ID,
BIDDING_ID,
RESULTS_NUMBER,
MY_OFFER_MONEY,
DEAL_MONEY,
REMARK,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
SUPPLIER_ID,
PROJECT_ID,

mapper.update:
update T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIDDING_ID = #{record.biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULTS_NUMBER = #{record.resultsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MY_OFFER_MONEY = #{record.myOfferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEAL_MONEY = #{record.dealMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIDDING_ID = #{record.biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULTS_NUMBER = #{record.resultsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MY_OFFER_MONEY = #{record.myOfferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEAL_MONEY = #{record.dealMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIDDING_ID = #{biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULTS_NUMBER = #{resultsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MY_OFFER_MONEY = #{myOfferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEAL_MONEY = #{dealMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO set PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIDDING_ID = #{biddingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULTS_NUMBER = #{resultsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MY_OFFER_MONEY = #{myOfferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEAL_MONEY = #{dealMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO R WHERE R.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND R.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId} AND BIDDING_ID = '1'

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO R WHERE R.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND R.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId} AND BIDDING_ID = '2'
select sum(DEAL_MONEY) from T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO where PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SUPPLIER_ID,PROJECT_ID,PRODUCT_ID,MY_OFFER_MONEY,BIDDING_ID FROM T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY SUPPLIER_ID,PROJECT_ID,PRODUCT_ID,MY_OFFER_MONEY,BIDDING_ID ORDER BY BIDDING_ID,PRODUCT_ID
SELECT DISTINCT BIDDING_ID FROM T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
